question: For a hyperbola with its foci on the x-axis, what is the focal radius?
options: $\begin{gathered}M\text{ on the right branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ex_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ex_0-a\end{cases}\\M\text{ on the left branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ex_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ex_0+a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on the upper branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ey_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ey_0-a\end{cases} \\M\text{ on the lower branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ey_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ey_0+a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on the upper branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ey_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ey_0+a\end{cases} \\M\text{ on the lower branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ey_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ey_0-a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on the right branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ex_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ex_0+a\end{cases}\\M\text{ on the left branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ex_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ex_0-a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$
topic: High--Intermediate Geometry--Equations of Conic Sections

question: For a hyperbola with foci on the y-axis, what is the focal radius?
options: $\begin{gathered}M\text{ on right branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ex_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ex_0-a\end{cases}\\M\text{ on left branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus}:\left|MF_1\right|=-ex_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ex_0+a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on top branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ey_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ey_0+a\end{cases} \\M\text{ on bottom branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ey_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ey_0-a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on top branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ey_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ey_0-a\end{cases} \\M\text{ on bottom branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=-ey_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ey_0+a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$

$\begin{gathered}M\text{ on right branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus:}\left|MF_1\right|=ex_0-a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=ex_0+a\end{cases}\\M\text{ on left branch}\begin{cases}\text{Left focus}:\left|MF_1\right|=-ex_0+a\\\text{Right focus:}\left|MF_2\right|=-ex_0-a\end{cases}\end{gathered}$
topic: High--Intermediate Geometry--Equations of Conic Sections
